title: Extreme Shield Protectant Wipes by Armor All, Interior Car Cleaning Wipes with UV Protection Against Cracking and Fading, 25 Count
description: Armor All Extreme Shield Car Protectant Wipes make it quick and easy to clean and protect your vehicle's interior. Convenient disposable wipes use a 5-in-1 formula with stain blocker to protect against spills and soils, and UV protectant to shield against UV damage. These vinyl protectant car wipes clean plastic, vinyl and rubber while shielding against dust, dirt and lint buildup to keep your car fresh and clean with one simple wipe. Formulated to be non-greasy, these car cleaning wipes also enhance the depth of color and give your interior surfaces a medium shine finish without leaving them greasy. Keep the canister of car interior wipes in your vehicle to easily wipe down surfaces whenever you need a quick cleaning touch-up. The moisture lock lid keeps the wipes fresh for a year. Help keep your car looking and feeling like new with Armor All.
